name: Website
description:
This website is a third iteration and is made using Next.js. Next.js is a production grade React framework with a lot of benefits such as prerendering, prefetching and auto-routing.

All data is dynamically pulled from JSON files at compile time so that rendering this website becomes smooth and fast.

I've used Framer-Motion for most animations which integrates every well with Next.js.

Hope this isn't much of an eyesore.
